# 地图绘制练习

如下为世界地图：
```{r}
library(maps)
map("world", fill = TRUE, col = rainbow(200),
    ylim = c(-60, 90), mar = c(0, 0, 0, 0))
title("世界地图")
```

```{r}
library(maps)
head(USArrests)
```

```{r}
crimes <- data.frame(state=tolower(rownames(USArrests)), USArrests)
head(crimes)
```

```{r}
library(reshape2)
crimesm <- melt(crimes, id=1)
head(crimesm)
```
